A knowledge-sharing platform

Empower anyone in a company to create, track, and share courses on any device.

Anyone Can Create Courses

By allowing HR, legal counsel, and employees to create their own courses, Coursetto provides companies with a holistic catalogue of organizational policies and skills.

Creating custom content is a breeze on desktop and mobile.

  • Link video from YouTube or Vimeo
  • Link voice over or any sound with SoundCloud
  • Add images or animated gifs
  • Create a quiz anywhere
  • Track completion dates and progress
  • Collaborate and create courses together

Use our responsive course composer

No design skills needed.

Register

Create a Custom Company Structure

The Old Way

Tracking employee course progress in a large company structure can be difficult with other out-of-the-box solutions.

The Coursetto Way

Create your company's organization tree any way you need. Place managers in charge of their own tier to create micro training environments.

And You Get Graphs!

Assign managers and employees to their own tiers and delegate training. Then track progress across all tiers.

Course Marketplace

Experts: Get Paid to Teach What You Know

Do you know a lot about a topic that could help a business grow? Are you an expert at sales, leadership, marketing, graphic design, or another topic? Start creating courses with Coursetto and you can earn money while teaching others what you know!

Just set your own price and launch it to the marketplace.

Companies: Purchase Pre-existing Courses

  • Purchase standard compliance courses
  • Distribute a standard course to the correct positions
  • Share your training with your industry and stop reinventing the wheel. It helped with the open source community.
